title: Consigliato
text: Per la media della Grande Mela è un hotel eccellente. Senza fronzoli, camere abitabili, bella vista sull'Empire. Colazione ottima, possibilità anche di portare il mangiare in camera, sala piccolina, ma noi, svegliandoci presto la mattina, non abbiamo mai avuto problemi di posto. Ascensori efficienti. Pulizia più che buona. Staff gentile e disponibile. La posizione quasi sulla quinta strasa, impagabile, vicino a tutto. Qualità prezzo ottima.

title: New York City
text: Conveniently located in uptown Manhattan, within walking distance to Times Square, Empire State Building, Rockefeller Building, Grand Central Terminal. Small but cozy rooms & quiet enough to get some rest.

title: Location Location Location
text: This was an excellent hotel with good location.  We are not used to such small rooms but when you are in New York, you don’t spend a lot of time in your room just like European vacations especially Venice.  We paid less than other hotels so we were very pleased.  Breakfast was exceptional.

title: Great stay in NYC
text:
The cleanliness of the hotel was excellent and of utmost importance. The beds were comfortable and the space in the bedroom was very good for having two double beds with adequate closet and shelves. The lighting in the room was very good. Having a refrigerator and safe was important and appreciated. It was quiet, noise from other guests was minimal and although the street outside wasn't busy, there was no noise through the windows. One of which opened slightly which was nice to get some fresh air. The temperature control for the room worked well. 
A downside: The bathroom sink area was way too small especially for two people. Although there were some shelves below the sink, there wasn't much space to put toiletries. But the shower was excellent and there was plenty of hot water. 
The worst: The included breakfast was very poor. And 15 minutes before it ended they ran out of coffee and wouldn't make more. The space was extremely tiny and we had to wait for seats. I can imagine in high season this would absolutely not be workable. I would advise going out for breakfast. There are a lot of good to excellent choices from 1 to 15 mins walk nearby.
Location: Garment District, convenient to Broadway for plays and some good eating in the area. Also close to Madison Square garden and Penn Station. The cleanliness of the hotel was excellent and of utmost importance. The beds were comfortable and the space in the bedroom was very good for having two double beds with adequate closet and shelves. The lighting in the room was very good. Having a refrigerator and safe was important and appreciated. It was quiet, noise from other guests was minimal and although the street outside wasn't busy, there was no noise through the windows. One of which opened slightly which was nice to get some fresh air. The temperature control for the room worked well. 
A downside: The bathroom sink area was way too small especially for two people. Although there were some shelves below the sink, there wasn't much space to put toiletries. But the shower was excellent and there was plenty of hot water. 
The worst: The included breakfast was very poor. And 15 minutes before it ended they ran out of coffee and wouldn't make more. The space was extremely tiny and we had to wait for seats. In high season this wouldn't  be workable. Advise breakfast out. There's good to excellent choices from 1 to 15 mins walk nearby. Convenient to Broadway, MSG and Penn St. Fifth Ave. Quiet area at nite, no sirens.

title: Excelente hotel
text: Localização excelente, próximo a metrô e a diversos pontos turísticos. Quarto limpo e confortável. Funcionários muito educados e atenciosos. Café da manhã muito bom.

title: Short pleasure stay in New York
text: The Wingate is a great little hotel in great location just off 5th Avenue. Easy access to nearby attractions and shopping with others easily accessible with an excellent bus service from both 5th and 6th Avenues. We would definitely recommend this hotel for a short stay in New York and would stay there again on future trips.

title: Excellent hotel
text: I must say I was very surprised and very happy with this property. It is so well located. The room was very clean, the staff was excellent. And there was a very nice breakfast. I would definitely stay there again.

title: Convenient stay
text: The staff was kind and the rooms were small but convenient in terms of spaces. Also new and spacious bathrooms. Overall very clean which is greatly appreciated. As suggestions, I would highly advise to renovate the breakfast area as it is a small. The hotel is midtown, very convenient to walk around and I would recommend it.

title: Terrible Front Desk Experience
text: Front desk representative,  FREDDY MUNOZ, awful human being; made me very uncomfortable and feel unsafe, a liar threatened  to cancel my reservation because he wanted everyone's id although only my name was on the reservation?  Said was policy ask for the policy said manager said asked for the manager refused to call or verify.  On purpose he assigned me a disgusting room the size of my master bathroom  at home.  Not even a sink in the bathroom, overlooking an alley.  I was suppose to have a queen bed, he assigned me a double bed...The room was smaller than the room I had in Japan.  He is the worst the housekeeping manager had to intervene I would never stay at this place EVER!..To think I am doing a tour of a Wyndham property for an upgrade, and they assign me this dump, with the worse front desk person I ever experienced and interacted.  He is a weird and terrible person....What is worse I received a response from the manager and she advised it was ok that employees can lie and state "hotel policy" without having to prove or show anything in writing or even explain?  Be treated like a criminal, so if you bring small children, and whoever make to this property make sure you have their id.  If you do not like it they are given the authority to cancel your reservation.  I guest they think we are in a communist country without due process or accountability.  This is so subjective and bias.  So if you do not like how you are not valued contact the franchisee as Wyndham Hotels & Resorts customer care told me:  Celine Chen @ 929-486-2666.

title: Excellent choice
text:
No frills hotel. Clean facility and very secure. Key card or buzz to get into building and key card needed for elevator. 

Close to major attractions and very affordable. 

Rooms are very small but it is a narrow building. 4 rooms to a floor

title: Perfect room for us
text: My wife and I stayed in a room with a view of the Empire State Building. Yes, the room is small, but we were able to completely enjoy our 8-night stay. The King bed was comfortable, the room was quiet, all staff members were friendly and very helpful. We were minutes away from Broadway and various train stops.

title: Excelente ubicación y buena atención del personal!
text:
Excelente atención del personal, pero debo destacar a Jennifer y a Tenzin que fueron súper amables!
Las habitaciones son muy pequeñas, pero al estar varias noches nos dieron la de personas con alguna dificultad de movilidad que son más grandes.
Muy conforme en relación precio y calidad.
La crítica es el lugar de desayuno que es muy pequeño y se colapsa en determinados horarios!

title: Très bon séjour à New York
text:
Personnel sympathique, vue de la chambre sur l’empire state building magnifique, chambre petite mais fonctionnel, ménage fait tous les jours, localisation de l’hôtel parfaite. 
Salle du petit déjeuner petite mais aucun problème si on se lève tôt.

title: Trop bruyant
text: Beaucoup de bruyant du au énorme unité de climatisation au bord des fenêtres de notre chambre qui était minuscule. La salle du petit déjeuner est minuscule par rapport au nombre de personnes dans l’hôtel. Il fallait faire la queues plusieurs minutes pour obtenir une place assise. Certains déjeuner debout !

title: Clean affordable small room
text: Overall it was a good stay due to the reasonable rate I paid fort the room. The rooms are small which i wasn't expecting and the morning free breakfast was good but lacked sufficient seating for everyone. The waffle maker had a line due to the amount of time it takes to make waffles. But other than that it was new and clean. Going to the basement for water and ice is a little weird too. Maybe you could put them closer to the guests? I gave it 5 stars because the rate i paid was fair for the experience.

title: Hotel mediocre
text:
Non consiglio questa struttura, se non per la posizione. 
Inesistente pulizia delle camere, nonostante le aree comuni vengano tenute molto bene.
Servizio colazione buono ma sala non adatta alla capienza dell’hotel.

title: tres bonne adresse à New York
text: hôtel très bien situé pour les visites touristiques, petite structure, très propre, chambre confortable et belle salle de bain, copieux petit déjeuner et personnel aimable ; aucun reproche, le séjour était parfait

title: Great hotel!
text: Great clean hotel!!! very small hotel with decent size rooms for NYC.  We had a room with 2 double beds overlooking the Empire State Building.  The bathroom was a modern bathroom with a rain shower (no tub). The room had a small desk, tv, and safe and fridge.  it had only 6 rooms per floor.  IN order to get into the hotel, you needed  room key and in order to use the elevator you needed a room key. The staff were very nice.  It was modern, clean and in a good location between 6th and 5th on 37th. Location was safe overall for NYC.

title: Great property. Greater location.
text: This property is in a very good location. My wife and I went there the on Christmas week. We saw everything we wanted to see for Christmas.  The property is centrally located, in the middle of every significant place. Everything was within walking distance. Rooms are a little small but we didn’t stay in our rooms too long: so much to see and do and eat. Will definitely stay there again.

title: great location and comfortable room
text: The location of the hotel is perfect, it takes you less than 5 minutes to get to the 5th avenue and about 10 mins to get to times square, we had a view of empire state building from our window. The staff were friendly, and the room was clean and comfortable. The breakfast could have had more variety, but this did not affect our overall experience. I would recommend the hotel to anyone visiting New York.

title: Great hotel, perfect location
text: Perfect for families. Had two rooms with twin queen beds for the 5 of us. Both had fantastic views of The Empire State Building. Immaculately clean. Friendly staff. Breakfast set us up for the day. Location is excellent.

title: This is the hotel you are looking for!
text: My mom and I recently stayed here for a short weekend trip to NYC. I cannot say enough how amazing this hotel was. Every staff member was kind and helpful. They helped us navigate to the subway and made restaurant recommendations when we asked. The hotel felt safe. It’s in a nice area and the doors only open with your key card for added security. The hotel was so clean from the lobby to our room. The bed was so comfortable and so nice after a long day of touring the city! I would absolutely recommend this hotel to anyone! It had everything we wanted! So glad we stayed here!

title: Great location, clean but small rooms and limited amenities
text: The location of the Wingate is convenient, close to midtown Manhattan, the theater district, restaurant row, Rockefeller Center - all are within walking distance. Check in was easy - the front desk stored our bags as we arrived earlier than expected and our room wasn't ready.  This hotel is cash-free - if you're looking for small bills for tipping you'll have to get change outside the hotel.   There are  4 guest rooms per floor in the 18th floor facility, we found elevators to be accessible and uncrowded during our 3 night stay.  We felt very safe at this hotel, the front door and elevators require a hotel key to access guest floors.  There was very little external noise nor was there much in-building noise. We were on the 13th floor and other than the occasional guest room door closing it was quiet. The rooms are clean but tiny, usable for a single occupant, cramped for two or more. The bedding was new and comfortable, the beds themselves are platforms which allowed the mattress to slide around, we discovered this after the first night of sleep.  The included breakfast was served in a somewhat cramped 1st floor area that got crowded at peak times.  The food was acceptable to good, depending on the daily selection, with hot selections of scrambled eggs and either sausage or bacon, DIY waffles, breads and pastries, juices, coffees, yogurts and fresh fruit.  There is no fitness center nor valet parking, although the hotel has a discount program with a parking lot around the corner on 38th street who promptly retrieved our car upon checkout. The only ice machine for guest use was in the basement, meaning you needed an elevator ride to get ice for the room. We were unpleasantly surprised to discover that the weekend NFL schedule was not available on the room television channel selections. As a frequent guest of the Wyndham chain, I rate this facility as average due to its convenient location, cleanliness of the room and facility, but due to the relatively high room rate and small room and limited amenities, I would investigate other options along with this one.

title: Comfortable
text: This hotel is in a perfect location. The staff was efficient and personable. The room was clean and comfortable but very small. Great for one night or one person. The only thing we missed was a full length mirror. Select a room in the back on a high floor.We will be back very soon

title: Nice hotel
text: Very nice, clean and convenient place to stay. Staff are very friendly. I booked one queen bed room which is a little bit small, but big enough for one person stay for one night. No cell phone signal at room.

title: Great property and location
text: This hotel was well maintained and was in a great location. The staff was friendly and the breakfast that was provided was good too. Location was convenient to the train, museums, Rockefeller, and restaurants.

title: It's a closet
text: If you like a closet for almost 500 a night. Clean is the best I can say. All the desk staff are great, Manager is not.Seems all the staff are afraid of him. Breakfast was ridiculous. Eggs were gone and by the time the cooking staff was done playing around it was 45 minutes. Common sense, eggs are low, cook then, NOT after they are gone.

title: Decent Hotel in South Midtown
text: Great location in midtown south.  Fairly new hotel; still clean and modern.  Rooms are small -- ours was barely suitable for two persons and lacked adequate space for luggage.  The bathroom lacks shelf space.  The included breakfast was better than expected.  Overall, the hotel is fine for a short stay.

title: Fantastic hotel! Clean rooms, helpful staff and a great breakfast buffet.
text: We stayed at this hotel for three nights and were very happy. The staff was so nice and friendly. The rooms were very good and clean. The included breakfast was a fantastic addition and we really enjoyed that.

title: Super séjour
text: 6 nuits en chambre familiale avec vue sur l empire state building.  Chambre taille très correcte,  très propre.  Personnel très agréable et serviable.  Excellent emplacement.  Seule la salle du petit déjeuner est un peu petite. Je recommande

title: Lo esperado por el.precio
text: Muy buena atención en la recepción,  el personal habla español  muy limpio, la habitación es muy pequeña pero es entendible para el precio y por ser.en manhatan. La ubicacion es estrategica, cerca a estaciones del metro y bryan park. Por otro lado el desayuno puede ser mejorado,  poca variedad

title: Inmejorable
text: Gran estancia, ubicación y servicios. La habitación es super cómoda, la cama es de lo mejor, descansamos super bien y el desayuno la oportunidad de salir preparados para recorrer la gran ciudad con bastante variedad

title: Housekeeping every day!
text: The room was reasonably roomy for a Manhattan hotel.  It was very clean and, oh glorious, we received housekeeping every day.  It is the first hotel we've stayed at since COVID that that has happened.  No stinky trash accumulating, the room was always clean and fresh.  Every employee we encountered was friendly and accommodating.  The only less than great experience was the breakfast, it had minimal options, but then they don't have a lot of space to work with.  The location of the hotel close to two subway stations was also a big plus.

title: Tutto perfetto!
text: Struttura impeccabile, posizione top, vicinissima a Bryant park e time square. Personale eccellente, servizo di pulizia in camera supertop! Ottima e abbondante la colazione.. Consigliatissimo sotto ogni aspetto!

title: Muy buen hotel
text: Volvería a reservar aquí sin duda, habitaciones pequeñas pero funcionales cupieron nuestras 4 maletas 2 grandes y 2 chicas. Éramos mi esposo y yo, todo muy cómodo y la ubicación ufff excelente, personal muy amable y hablan español.

title: Loved this hotel
text: Hotel was a great location and value with the continental breakfast (so many options) was awesome. The rooms were clean, comfortable beds and a great bathroom/shower. The hotel held out suitcases free of change upon signing out. A great place to stay in NYC.

title: Perfect Hotel!
text:
I cannot say enough positive things about this hotel! 
Everything was always clean and smelled nice. Our room was small, but I am sure that is typical for a NYC hotel. It was just enough space for 2 of us, though. 
We were on the top floor and our view of the Empire State Building was phenomenal! 
Staff was always so friendly and welcoming. They even had the lobby decorated for Halloween, which was so cute and warm feeling. It really gives you a sense that the employees enjoy what they do. 
The breakfast area was a little small, but we got there early and didn’t encounter any issues or overcrowding. It was all really delicious, as well. 
LOCATION! The location that this hotel is in is absolutely perfect. It’s off a side-street, so not a ton of city noise. Almost everything is walkable, though, or a short subway ride. 
We walked to Times Square and Rockefeller center. Empire State is mere blocks away. And the Statue of Liberty was a short walk and subway ride. 
Excellent hotel, would 100% stay here again.

title: tolle Lage, kleine, moderne Zimmer, gutes Frühstück
text: Hotel liegt in der 37 W/ 5 th. und damit eine tolle Lage um NY / Manhattan zu erkunden. TimesSquare ist nur wenige Minuten entfernt. Kleine und moderne, sehr saubere Zimmer. Gutes Frühstück. wir kommen gerne wieder

title: Great Hotel
text: 4 nights, fantastic service, super clean, beautiful rooms, great breakfast, excellent location. Walking distance to most major midtown attractions, we also had a view of the Empire State bouillon’s. I’d stay here again without a doubt.

title: Tiny Room
Poor Customer Consideration
text: I was not able to arrive due to flooding on Long Island that was reported across all media outlets.  Based on the feedback I would be charged a night because others were able to arrive, which is a ridiculous measure.  Everyone isn’t trying to come from the same location.

title: Good for a place to Sleep and Shower
text:
This hotel was everything I needed for a weekend break in the city. The room is compact, but clean. With a good shower, comfortable bed and enough storage for clothes. The rooms are small but serviceable. 
Breakfast had a good selection but the room is tiny and I had to eat standing up.

title: Monto Retenido en la tarjeta de Crédito en concepto de garantía
text: Hotel bien ubicado para alguna de los lugares a visitar Grand Centras Station, Bryan Park, Public Library, buen desempeño del personal de Recepción, pero muy demorada la gestiòn para que liberen de la tarjeta de crèdito el monto retenido como garantìa, estuve en dos hoteles diferentes usando la misma tarjeta de crèdito y a diferencia de este hotel el proceso fue automàtico una vez que hice el check out.

title: Excellent séjour
text:
Nous sommes restés douze nuits dans cet établissement. De notre arrivée à notre départ tout le personnel (réception, ménage, petit-déjeuner) été extrêmement agréable, efficace et serviable.
Notre chambre avec vue sur l'ESB était très bien avec une taille suffisante (même pour un séjour de 12 nuits). La literie est très confortable. Je regrette simplement que le placard ne soit pas fermé. Le réfrigérateur est tres utile. Le ménage a ete fait tous les jours sauf un. Mais la gouvernante est passée en fin d'après-midi pour renouveler le linge de toilette et s'assurer que nous ne manquions de
rien.
Comme les avis le disent, la salle du petit-déjeuner est petite, mais avec un peu de patience, il est tres possible de trouver une place. Le petit-déjeuner ottert est complet (sale, sucre, yaourts, cheese cream, céréales, pains, bagels,...) et varie selon les jours (parfums des pâtisseries, bacon ou saucisses accompagnant les œufs brouillés, ...).
La bagagerie gratuite à l'arrivée (avant 16h - mais tout a été fait pour la mettre à notre disposition bien plus tôt!) et au départ est tres utile.
L'estimation à 2,5 étoiles est très au dessous de la réalité. Et bien des hôtels 4 étoiles de New York que nous avons connus pourraient prendre exemple.
Nous reviendrons sans hésitation au Wingate by
Wyndham NYC Midtown south.

title: Small space with sweet sleep
text: Proprty always smell sweet &  fresh-  located steps away from Broadway & time Square Breaflkfast satisfying with options of cold/hot cereals muffins and waffles. At time of visit felt safe to access property at nights . Property located steps away from resturants that stay open late. ENtire state building located near by.Cons: single queen/king size rooms are small.  No self service laundry facility on premise. WILL COME BACK AGAIN

title: Not a City View
text: The hotel staff were lovely and the room was clean. The free breakfast was a plus. The room was a shoebox and the closet was non-existent. It was hard to move around the room with two people. The shower was tiny (I am a tiny person only 5"0) and I had a difficult time maneuvering. It also had a rainfall shower head which is not condusive for those who don't wash their hair everyday. We chose this hotel because we could get a city view room. The city view was more of an industrial view. I don't think I would stay here again due to the size of the room and the not so city view.

title: Great hotel. No parking.
text: Hotel is great! 5 stars! Front desk staff is amazing! I would have found a hotel with parking if friends weren't already staying there. Parking garage not far, though, so don't let that deter you. Tip: don't bring a car to the City! lol

title: A-
text:
After a two night stay, here are my views:

Pros: cute/modernize room; very friendly staff; located near the action; complementary breakfast

Cons: no access to the rooftop: extremely small room; the closet is a nook; the shower is small and the showerhead is a rainfall style (I don't wet/wash my hair during every shower); the "City View" was best described as an industrial view.

title: Excellent place
text: The place is close to many places of interest. It's in a bustling area with lot of tourists. The place is clean and tidy. Breakfast is great and staff is very friendly and helpful. The rooms are a bit small, though.

title: Worst hotel manager I've ever dealt with
text:
Worst hotel experience EVER!!
The hotel manager Selena hung up the phone on me, won't return my calls and won't refund a stay that's four months away. 

I'm a travel agent and have done a lot of business in this industry, these people at this hotel have unsavory business practices, IMHO.
This is my first negative review
Stay away and go somewhere else, I never plan on doing business with them again. I feel liked I was taken advantage of and the manager refuses to give me the owners name.

Awful and sad to run a business like this!
No hospitality here!

title: Such a lack of courtesy
text: I've never experienced a lack of courtesy like that anywhere in the world before. The room was ready and available and they wanted to charge $30 for early check-in before 4 pm. I've always experienced the extreme opposite, if the room is ready and available the property always offered early check-in as a courtesy. The staff was rude and made me feel like a fool. Also, the bathroom door doesn't provide privacy if you're not staying alone and the toilet paper is of poor quality. If you can, don't stay there!

title: Bring ear plugs
text: Noise Noise Noise !!!  Do not get a room on the street side facing the Empire state building . You will need Tylenol and ear plugs . Noise is so bad that you will not get any sleep ,unless you walk in at 2 am . Room was clean and breakfast was just ok . Elevators beep a lot .Basically this place is not sound proof on all levels. people at the desk were nice and tried hard to make us feel welcome .Manager was useless.

title: Very good NYC hotel location for reasonable price
text: Perfect for a short stay up to 4 days. Location is great and staff is very attentive and polite. Metro access not far away. The prices are reasonable concerning to other NYC locations. We will be back.

title: Great hotel! Loved it!
text: This hotel is super clean! My room was always fresh and welcoming on my return from sightseeing! Cool too which was great as it was very warm out! The location is great, I paid for a Gotham view and loved it. Had a 17th floor room so just superb views! Breakfast was varied and tasty. Was a very small dining area but you could take food to your room so it was manageable. Really enjoyed my 7 night stay and would return. Staff really friendly!

title: Nice stay
text: Exceeded our expectations, very secure with access cards required, breakfast a little crowded, rooms very small but clean and efficient, no street noise, would recommend to family and friends, look forward to another stay

title: AMAZING
text: For starters, the everyone who works there is so nice!! I absolutely LOVED this hotel and would definitely come back. For me, it’s a bit hard to find a hotel because I cannot stay in one where the room has a carpet, but this hotel didn’t have a carpet at all! Everything was very clean and it’s not a far walk to Times Square! Not to mention, there’s places to eat all around! You do not need a car at all because public transportation is all around!! Also, how can I forget the complimentary breakfast?! Such a great experience! I will be coming back for sure.

title: Great
text: Very very clean and comfortable great stay. Would loose a point or 2 for breakfast and location of breakfast too small but staff lovely and very comfortable. Really pleased as clean is important to us

title: Highly Recommended
text: This hotel was spotless in every area.  My room was small, but it was perfect for my purpose.  The breakfast was great with a lot of items to choose from. Your room key is required to enter the building as well as the elevator.  This made me feel very safe in New York City.

title: Urlaubsreise 5 Tage
text:
Nettes Hotel mit freundlichem Personal, die hinteren Zimmer sind durch Klimaanlagen sehr geräuchbelastet, Bad, Bett und Einrichtung ok, für längere Aufenthalte fehlt ein Kleiderschrank.
War mit meiner Frau für 5 Tage dort zum Städtetrip.

title: Winning at the Wingate by Windham New York Midtown
text:
We had an amazing time while staying at the Wingate by Wyndham. We arrived by train at Grand Central and it was a short walk to the hotel, where we were greeted warmly and given early check-in. 
Our room was small but very clean and had everything we needed. We were in the back of the hotel, which is quieter, but the view was of some older buildings and a fire escape. It didn't really matter because we were not in NYC to sit in our room. 
The hotel is just a couple of blocks from Bryant Park and the New York Public Library. Get takeout from the Bryant Park Deli and grab a table in the park to eat like New Yorkers instead of tourists. 
The New York Public Library has an outstanding free museum. 
It is only a short walk to Times Square. We saw a Broadway show each night and were fine walking in the neighborhood of the hotel while coming back late. There was always a desk clerk on duty and we could tell that security was a priority.
There are only 4 rooms on each floor and two elevators. We never had to wait long for an elevator during our stay. 
The breakfast room is like the guestrooms, compact. The staff worked hard to provide breakfast each morning featuring waffles, eggs, bacon or sausage and a variety of breads, muffins and pastries. There was also cereal, oatmeal, fresh fruit and a selection of single-serve yogurts. Beverages included coffee, tea and hot chocolate. Breakfast gets crowded, so get there early to get a table.
Kudos to the hard-working staff on their unfailing courtesy and willingness to help. This hotel is very well-run. We have already booked our next visit and highly recommend this for the location, cleanliness and customer service.

title: Horrible Service
text: The location is the only nice thing about this property. The service is horrible. Don't even think that your membership level means anything! Because it does not. They even had us checking out the day before our reservation was to end.

title: Bad management and customer service
text:
My cousin and I were supposed to visit NYC from August 3rd to August 6th. My cousin is handicapped, and we are both students. Today is June 27th, my cousin had an emergency health issue that made her body freeze and her heart beat like crazy. Her family brought her to the hospital to check. Thus, I canceled this hotel today that I booked through Expedia in June 11th, and no refund appeared even though our trip would be in another month. I talked to Expedia, and they told me to get approval from the hotel. I called the hotel 3 times to ask for that, but they said no. I made a deal that I do not need a refund for myself, but at least please 50% at least of the amount that we paid ($923 for 3 nights) for my cousin's hospital bills. (or even $300 or $400). Their final answer is still a no. They have no heart in this situation.
Talking about the business side, they have problems with ethics in management. I have been managing 1 restaurant and 1 nail shop for a couple of years, and I am an MBA student in Florida. I just see this hotel is gaining money from visitors without customer service and ethics; related to this, I am not sure whether their room is cleaned or anything else. PLEASE AVOID THIS HOTEL.
Thank you for your reading.

title: Great stay
text: Midtown is the best place to stay if your in Manhattan and the Wingate by Wyndham made it so. Our family had a great time the hotel was quite and clean. They have a great breakfast to get the day started.

title: Bien situé, Petit déjeuner compris, Chambre trop petite. Accès PMR ok
text:
*Cet hôtel est hyper bien situé : proche des transports (bus + metro) , dans le centre, à quelques  minutes de marche de Bryant  Park - de Grand central - Times Square 
* Séjour de 13 nuits dans cet hôtel conçu pour recevoir des touristes de passage (2-3 nuits maximum) qui se déplacent avec peu de bagages.[ce qui n'était  pas notre cas puisque long séjour + 4 valises)
* Petit déjeuner à partir de 6h00 en semaine et 7h00 le week-end.  Propreté, choix : - sucré  (viennoiseries +cakes + gaufres + pain) -  salé : oeufs/ Saucisses ou lard- fruits - yaourts - jus / café/thé.  Salle trop petite comparativement à  la capacité de l'hôtel ---> y aller des l'ouverture  pour avoir de la place .
"Big up " à  la dame qui gère le petit déjeuner en semaine (extra , gentille, bosseuse).
* Accueil : tout le personnel n'est pas hyper sympathique. +++ à la réceptionniste qui attendait un bébé.
(La nuit il y a eut dans la chambre à côté de la nôtre à 4h30 du matin une  grosde dispute de couple dans  la chambre  voisine qui a réveillé les 3 autres chambres. Je suis descendue à la réception, suis remontée avec le réceptionniste de nuit venu constater les cris ... qui est redescendu aussitôt et n'a pas agi. Nuit suivante idem...). 
* Chambre : j'avais prévenu l'hôtel  via un mail que je suis PMR (déplacements avec difficultés en béquille...). Mais nous avons reçu une chambre "mini" au 14ème étage. Impossible de se mouvoir. Tout est à collé, évier dans la chambre, pas de place dans le placard...
Impossible de vider nos valises (manque de places) , impossible d'entreposer nos valises (manque de place...
Chambre : lit Queen size ( pas grand) mais très confortable + machine café (capsules) + sèche cheveux + defroisseur vêtements + produits mini (salle de bain).
Ménage chambre : lit fait tous les jours, produits sdb + café remplacés, ménage (laisse à désirer...tâches non nettoyées pendant nos 13 jours sur place.
Après une demande, une longue  discussion, des menaces, ... et un supplément de 250$ nous avons obtenu le lendemain une chambre  plus grande adaptée à  mon handicap au 4ème étage. (Chambre pour personne à mobilité réduite) avec espace  + salle de bain séparée + rangements  +++ 
Cet hôtel n'est pas fait pour les longs séjours. 
* A notre arrivée nous avons réglé en plus une somme de 200$ comme garantie (récupérée quelques jours après notre retour).
* L'hôtel vend des boissons fraîches à l'accueil (moins chères en achetant à l'extérieur)
*** nous y retournerons si notre prochain séjour est plus court et si je reçois une chambre adaptée à mon handicap 
*** langues parlées : anglais + espagnol

title: New York New York
text:
Great location, make sure you book a top floor room for the view of the Empire State Building.
Clean, modern, comfortable.
Room size was great (1803). However we did ask to move from 1304 as it was too small.

Breakfast room is chaos. Worth getting there early and not on the hour when everyone else arrives as there are only about 14 seats for a 70+ room hotel.
Breakfast cost included though was a bonus.

One disappointment. Scaffolding was assembled on the face of the hotel at 6am one morning. It was extremely noisy and woke us up.

title: Good location; not a good room to do anything but sleep
text: The location was good and staff were nice--but the room was lackluster and not well set-up to do work. Everything was extremely cramped. If you just need to sleep and value the location, this is a fine option. Otherwise, you can likely find better value-for-money elsewhere.

title: Terrible Service
text:
The management at this hotel is non existtent . They charged us for the stay even though the trip was prepaid. After checking the charges on our Visa we told them what had happened nobody could reverse the charges. We were told they could not see charges in their system . There was no manager on site .It's been 5 days things are still not sorted.
Would not reccomend this Hotel to anyone
Gary

title: Clean, safe, convenient
text: Excellent location right at 5thAve.  Easy walk to Broadway shows and Times Square.  Convenient city bus to Metropolitan Museum of Art.  Nearby German and Irish restaurants.  Easy stay! Made some new friends at breakfast as many European travelers were there at the same time.  We arrived early, but the front desk was very accommodating to check our luggage and we were able to walk to a nearby museum.

title: Friendly and helpful
text: The hotel was well presented and the people were very helpful, the issue I would say was breakfast, very busy and little seating area, in all great value for money. You were in the center of NY and seemed very safe, not an issue the hotel can fix but NY smells bad of all the ganja being smoked.

title: Good value for price
text: This was a Useful location for our activities. Every staff member we observed or communicated with were friendly and competent. Attractive room. Attractive lobby and patio.  We appreciated being able to leave our bags after check in as we had an evening flight

title: Definitely recommend
text: Most comfortable hotel bed I have ever slept it. Clean property, friendly and helpful staff. Only problem was you can hear the elevator buzzing/beeping as it goes past every floor all day/night. Not too loud, but enough to wake you up. Would absolutely stay again.

title: The wingate at club Wyndham
text: The stay was quite &. The check in process was good..no microwaves in the rooms was a big deal for me the internet was slow to connect..the over all stay was a good business trip.the key card however.

title: Hotel consigliato
text: Hotel di nuova costruzione, buona posizione, colazione inclusa abbondante e soddisfacente sia nel dolce che salato. A due passi da Time Square ma comunque in zona tranquilla. Camere pulite con letti comodi.

title: Excelente experiência
text: Excelente localização, banho e café da manhã. Os pontos fracos são o espaço do café da manhã que é muito pequeno, a água do chuveiro que se espalha pelo banheiro e a limpeza que que tem que ser solicitada, mas tudo dá para ser muito bem contornado!

title: Room was clean, staff was friendly
text:
The room was very small but very clean, bathroom also. Bed was very comfortable, as well as the pillows. The elevator noise drove me crazy, and I didn't get room service in any of my three nights stay there. 
Breakfast was just ok.

title: Good place to stay!
text: The establishment was incredibly clean with a secure hotel entry.  The front rooms have an absolutely AMAZING view of the Empire State Building.  The hotel staff were all really friendly & accommodating.  The location was fabulous for our NYC visit including the late evening returns (the environment felt safe).

title: Close to everything!
text:
I am tempted to give it only 1 out of 5, so the rates don't go up and we can stay there next time!

It was my 3rd time in NY, and this is easily the best hotel I stayed in.
We had a very pleasant stay as a family of 4. 

Every member of staff was really nice and professional and did their utmost to help. 
The room was rather small (it's in Midtown Manhattan!), but had a wardrobe as well as a place for 2 suitcases. The shower itself was quite spacious.
If you come as a family, be aware that the beds are more queen than king.
Previous reviews mentioned the breakfast room being too small, but we never had to wait that long to find seats. There was a good variety of choice, too.
The location was just perfect: 5 minutes from Times Square and 5 minutes from the Empire State Building, 10 minutes from MSG, with many places to eat and drink in the area. 

We would love to stay there again.

title: Stedentrip NewYork
text: Kleinschalig hotel in Manhattan, dicht bij het  OV en alle bezienswaardigheden. Hotelkamer is goed, klein maar uiterst functioneel. Goede bedden, goed sanitair, alleen de ontbijtruimte is niet berekend op het aantal gasten. Vroeg ontbijten en je mijdt de drukte. Probeer een kamer zo hoog mogelijk te krijgen en kamers die eindigen op 3 of 4 hebben zicht op het iconische Empire State. Net hotel met vriendelijke gastheren en gastvrouwen.

title: NYC getaway
text: Location is great for Broadway shows and museums.  Property is clean, staff is friendly and helpful.  Rooms are small but well appointed with shelves and hooks on the wall, sort of reminds me of an entire room of IKEA  furniture.  Bathroom is good with the sink actually in the room.

title: A good hotel for a citytrip
text: If you wanna have a hotel nearby than this hotel is a good place. The rooms were good, the bathroom was excellent. The breakfast could be better if there was more place. The staff is very friendly and always with much patience helpfunctie. Value for money and if there is a next visit than i choose again.

title: Buen hotel. Desayuno incluido (no muy bueno).
text:
El hotel esta bien en relacion al precio. 
La ubicacion era muy buena, cerca de Bryant park y empire state. Habitaciones son chicas, el desayuno era rico pero muy poco variado y el espacio muy pequeño.

title: Vacations in new york next to the empire state
text: Good comfortable hotel, very clean, and very friendly staff in the center of Manhattan, very close to places of interest. And with normal breakfast. Good quality price, this is your hotel if you travel to new York for the first time

title: Wonderful!
text: I took a quick weekend trip to NYC and stayed at this hotel. It’s one of the best hotels I’ve stayed at! The staff were very very kind. The room is a little small, but it has everything you need, and the bathroom is a great size! Breakfast was good too. I will also say the location is great! Easy to walk to attractions and restaurants. Next time I’m in town, I would definitely stay here again!

title: cute and close to time square
text: it was ok a cute little hotel with breakfast and an amazing shower head. it was near time square as well as the public library.  however, it was a little bit claustrophobic I wish they offer medical rates for longer stays. overall best stuff and best location.

title: A gem in mid-town
text: I was so happy with everything about my stay including its great location! The staff was friendly, helpful and provided a welcoming setting. The breakfast was incredible with a range of selections for everyone’s needs.

title: Nice hotel in Midtown
text: Small room, but big and really beautiful bathroom. The bed was very comfy. The room was clean and very quiet - and it has a small fridge and a safety box. Good breakfast. Great location in Midtown. Easy check in and check out. I will definately come back.

title: Worst Place I never stayed at — EVER
text:
Excited but left homeless, disgusted and disappointed 

On my last vacation in Vegas, I checked out a Wyndham Resort and got their credit card. This was going to be the first time I said at their hotel/property. 

Upon arriving, they ask for a credit card. I explained in a rush, I left my purse and could provide either cash or a digital credit card. They explained they took neither. I ask to speak to the manger, she was even MORE unhelpful then the front desk clerk. 

I understand they have limits, at least they could have helpful suggestions on alternative. They could have commiserate with me and my situation. Good customer service isn't just renting someone a room. It's going the extra mile. All three of the next hotels that I tried, really tried to help me. 

If I could, I'd give this property less than three stars -3. As a New Yorker, born and raised I know we don't have to be mean, nasty and uncooperative. The service I received was the negative stereotype others have of our city. I suggest they do better and retrain their staff. Maybe, highlight the types of payments they can receive, not just some unread footnote.

title: Hotel bien situé
text: Hôtel très bien situé et très calme à 10 mm de Briant Park . Bien que les chambres soient petites il y a tout le confort . Literie impeccable. Seul bémol le petit déjeuner avant une salle vraiment trop petite.

title: Excelente hotel
text: Excelente ubicación, cercano al metro de NYC, cercano a TIME SQUARE, excelente vista al EMPIRE STATE (nuestra habitación era en el piso 15), buen desayuno, pero el comedor y la sala de estar son pequeños, la atención del personal excelente. Muy buen hotel.

title: voyage à 2
text:
Hotel propre
4 chambres par palier
Nous étions au 13 eme étage avec vue sur l'ESB
Chambre petite mais assez pour 2 personnes dans notre cas
Literie impeccable lit Kingsize pour 2 
Toutefois le ménage n'était pas fait tous les jours mais le nombre de serviette suffisait pour 2 jours 
Emplacement à proximité du métro sur la 37 (Metro sur le 35 eme à Herals Square en face du MAcy's et pas loin du MSG)

title: One night
text: Excellent location for an overnight stay in midtown especially for after show on Broadway. Staff were pleasant and efficient. We had of view of Empire State but would have been more spectacular on the higher floor.

title: Hotel excelente
text: O hotel é  excelente com ótimo atendimento, além de um café maravilhoso. O hotel esta próximo da estação de metro 34st, além de conseguir fazer uma grande parte dos passeios à pé. Ficamos em quarto perfeito com vista para Empire, o quarto tem o tamanho ideal para duas pessoas. Certamente, ficaria hospedado neste hotel outras vezes.

title: Great choice for NYC
text:
Breakfast is decent but the restaurant area is a little too small for the size of hotel meaning you often struggle to get a seat.

Great location for walking to a number of sites and accessing the subway for everything else.

Staff were friendly and welcoming and the check in and check out were speedy and easy. 
They have luggage storage if you arrive/leave at an inconvenient time for check in/out.

title: Perfect room for a weekend away
text: I usually stay in the New Yorker when I come up for a weekend show, but my friend and I decided to try out the Wingate.  We were blown away.  The servce was fabulous - thank you Jennifer for your help with the tickets.  The hotel is near enough to be an easy walk to Broadway, but far enough away to be quiet.  We swung into breakfast in the morning and grabbed a coffee and scone.  There was a good sample of pastries, coffee, and I think even a waffle maker.  It is really the best Wyndham hotel I have stayed at in NYC.

title: Exceptional Hotel and Staff
text: Our trip was a mothers and daughters weekend to see the Phantom of the Opera. This hotel location was so centrally located to everything that we wanted to do or see. We felt safe the entire time we were there even though we were out and about all over the city. The Hotel Staff is the absolute best that i've ever encountered. The Coffee Maker in the room was a priority as well as the variety of breakfast items each morning. We were totally satisfied with this Hotel. 5 Stars!!!!!

title: Great value
text:
Needed a hotel on 5th Avenue and this was the first time saying with Wingate. 
The price was very reasonable and the room was great.  
Check in was very friendly and fast. I will definitely stay there again in the future.

title: Hôtel très propre et bien situé
text: Nous avons beaucoup apprécié la situation de l'hôtel à proximité de Time square et de l'Empire state building. Les lits sont confortables, le personnel compétent et sympathique. Le rapport qualité prix est excellent.

title: Avoid at all cost: the most terrible customer service and rude manager with zero concern for customer satisfaction
text:
They do not honour prepaid reservations made by travel agents and do not let you know about this. I had a room booked via a travel agency that books any work related trips for the company I work with. They send a prepaid hotel voucher in the name of the person travelling. I have never had any issues with this, including other Wyndham hotels. Wingate is a franchise (I contacted the Wyndham group abut this) and this means they have their own rules and do as they please.
I contacted the hotel prior to arrival to enquire about the room and got a message back from Esteban who advised I will not be able to check in because the credit card used and its cardholder must be present during check-in along with a photo ID for verification. Obviously this is not possible when booking via a travel agent and having the hotel stay paid in advance. I followed up on that email asking for clarification to be met with complete silence. After being ghosted, finally someone else responded saying this is their policy, which, as far as I am concerned, cannot be found anywhere on their website. Sadly, I have no crystal ball to foresee what policies they have or invent as they go. Long story short, they cancelled my reservation and as a gesture of goodwill (!) issued a refund. Had I not contacted them prior to my arrival, I would have been left with no accommodation in NYC. They never meant to contact me or the travel agency advising the booking is not valid. They just wanted to keep the money and not allow people to check in. This is utterly unacceptable and unreasonable and beyond shocking.

title: Excellent Hotel
text: Stayed for a week in January 2023, the place was faultless from start to finish. All the staff are friendly and helpful. Rooms were small as expected but had everything you need (including a fridge and coffee maker) and we're spotless cleaned and serviced regularly. Free breakfast was a bonus and had an excellent variety of items , we were up early and never had any issue however did observe big queues towards the end of breakfast time as the room is quite small. For the price and location a definite 10/10. Hope to come back soon 👍

title: Amazing Hotel and Staff
text: The Hotel seems new with really nice installations and is amazingly located. The room had a beautiful view of the Empire State Building. The breakfast was life-saving, but the best was definitely the staff, always willing to help, every single one of them. I would totally stay there again!

title: Soggiorno fantastico
text: La struttura si trova in una posizione ottima, a pochissimi minuti a piedi da Times square, Bryant park e Fifth Ave, nonostante sia centralissimo è silenziosissimo. Camere belle e fornite di frigo e macchina del caffè. Letto comodissimo e pulizie delle camere effettuate ogni giorno. Struttura molto pulita, personale gentilissimo e colazione ottima e abbondante composta sia da dolce che salato. Se tornerò a New York sicuramente soggiornerò di nuovo qui! Consigliatissimo a tutti!

title: Excelente servicio
text: El hotel está muy bien localizado, cerca de todo y las personas son muy amables, la habitación un poco pequeña pero para una persona ok, todo muy limpio, el desayuno muy bueno y suficiente, definitivamente volvería a hospedarme.

title: Totally enjoyable stay
text:
The hotel staff made our stay quite enjoyable. Our room was very adequate, clean and quiet. Front desk personnel were helpful and accommodating. Our luggage was held for us until check-in as we were early into the city.  In addition, after our check-out, a package was safely kept for 
collection by our friend.
Alex was a source of fun and jovial conversations.

title: Great stay
text: We enjoyed staying here. Had a view of the empire state building which was nice. Thought that the price was reasonable and the location was good. We got a breakfast in the morning. I remember the lobby being very heavily scented, gave me a bit of a headache. So that is maybe something they could cut back on.

title: Empire Views and amazing staff! Must stay.
text: The rooms are small so be prepared but you can’t beat the Empire State Building views and the staff make the experience amazing. They also provide a simple breakfast. The value is totally worth the stay.

title: All things it set out to do and done right
text: Staff was super nice consistently. Yes, rooms are small but they look recently renovated so they are fine and cozy. Bed was amazing. Everything seemed very clean. The room had all we needed, really. GREAT location! Perhaps this is its biggest positive. We will probably stay here again when we visit NYC net time as it proved to be a safe bet. Would definitely recommend it!

title: Small but mighty
text: I was so pleasantly surprised. Staff was extremely friendly. Room was small but all we did was sleep. The bed was amazing. Breakfast was great, waffle maker was great!! Would definitely stay again. Glad I found this deal!! It was right in the heart of where we wanted to be!!

title: GREAT Location HOWEVER Rooms TOO SMALL
text:
The location is excellent. However the rooms are TOO SMALL. To put things in perspective… outside cruise ship cabins are bigger than the room we had. I’ve stayed at Wyndham Wingate Midtown prior to 2019.. apparently the location changed. So, I was caught off guard when I found out this was a different midtown location. In the prior location the rooms were much bigger. 

We were only there for a weekend. If my stay was longer I would have had to change hotels.

I’m giving it 3 stars due to the size of the room otherwise it would be 4 stars.

On a more positive note, the rooms are nice and customer service was EXCELLENT.

title: Sliver Hotel In Mid-Town NYC
text: Not a bad stay at all. Except, that for most, this room would be considered pretty small. There's a small cubby for shower and toilet but the sink was in the bed area. Nevertheless, the place was clean, well-lighted, with only 4 rooms per floor. The higher floors have some views, especially of the Empire State tower if you're facing south. Room had a mini fridge and a small breakfast was served downstairs. Wonderful location, too. Just behind Bryant Park and the NY Public Library. and Macy's and the 34th street shopping is the same distance heading south.

title: Great value very central hotel, with clean, comfortable bedroom/bathroom and friendly staff
text:
Great location - near to both Penn Staton (so easy from JFK on Airtrain and then LIRR), and Grand Central from where I was getting a train to Connecticut. But it’s also near lots of shops, Bryant Park, Empire State and Chrysler Building etc.

The reception staff were really friendly and helpful. The room and bathroom were very clean, it was modern and new, the bed was comfortable and the TV worked (and was showing the World Cup!). 

I was worried that for the price it wouldn’t live up to the pictures, but it did and was probably better. Great little tea/coffee machine, a microwave, and a fridge. The breakfast room isn’t huge and everyone leaves it later (though reception had warned me about that). But I grabbed a coffee, some fruit and a croissant and went back to my room to have.

Very happy and would stay again. Even had a view of the Empire State from my bed!

title: Lo straconsiglio!!!!
text: Hotel in buona posizione per raggiungere tutte le principali attrazioni a piedi. Ottima l accoglienza. Camera piccola ma pulita, letto molto comodo, con vista sull empire. Le pulizie vengono effettuate dal 3gg in poi causa covid,cmq viene avvisato. colazione salata e dolce buona e sempre rifornita. Consiglio di andarci sulle 7.30, perché il posto è piccolino e dopo non trovi il tavolino. Consiglio vivamente questo hotel. Voto 9

title: A gem in the city
text: A gem in the city with a PERFECT location to see the Macy’s Thanksgivings Day Parade. It goes down the street less than a block from the hotel. Their owners/staff are awesome…Selena, Alex and Esteban were all amazing. Selena was welcoming and gave us tips about the parade. She treated us like family. Esteban always had a smile on his face and was very kind and Alex was the comic relief.  The rooms are small but well suited for my bestie and I. We had an amazing view of the Empire States Building. The hotel was clean and the bed was comfy. Highly recommend.!!!!  Go get amazing cookies and coffee at Expresso Culture around the corner while you are there.

title: Best hotel great price
text: I enjoyed the location the price the quality of the room and the breakfast! Cant be better. No need to think twice. Just go and stay there! The price is as low as you can get in NYC and the quality is better than twice cost hotels!

title: Great location; SMALL room
text: Great for a weekend stay either solo or with a CLOSE friend.  There is not enough room to walk to the other side of the bed, NO privacy and not enough room for more than a backpack.  A shelf in the bathroom would be SO helpful.  The countertop is pretty much the size of the sink so there isn’t even room for a toothbrush.  No microwave.  On the plus side, there is a small refrigerator, you are mere steps to 5th Avenue, a quick 15 minute to Amtrak / Penn Station, and all of the other fabulous things NYC has to offer.  Yes, the rooms are SMALL, but a couple of extra shelves would be an easy fix and make a stay even better.  The desk people are really nice and very helpful!

title: Sehr angenehmes Hotel.
text: Genau die richtige Wahl für eine Woche in New York. Alles war zu unserer Zufriedenheit. Besonders positiv ist die Lage des Hotels zu bewerten. Die Verwendung von Einweggeschirr und Einwegbesteck beim Frühstück ist aus ökologischen Gesichtspunkten zu überdenken, ansonsten ist das Frühstück ausreichend.

title: Good location and friendly staff
text:
The hotel is in an excellent location being close to the Empire State Building, 5th and 6th Avenues and Times Square.  Staff were helpful and friendly on my arrival and I was able to get an early check-in (at ~2pm) which was ideal.  My room was on the 14th floor and I slept soundly with no noise issues.  I should point out however that the rooms are pretty small, with there being very little storage space (no wardrobe or chest of drawers).  The room and bathroom (shower only-no bath, with the wash hand basin being in the bedroom area) were clean and included a fridge, coffee machine and room safe.  Note that on check-in you are told that there is no daily room cleaning service.  This only occurs after the 3rd day although you will be provided with clean towels if needed.

The complimentary breakfast buffet was of a good standard with cereals, hot offerings (eggs, bacon and sausage etc.), breads, pastries and you could also make your own waffles courtesy of the waffle machine.  However, the breakfast area was pretty small with seating being limited and the area was often very crowded.

Overall, I enjoyed my stay but would probably consider other hotel options in future as a result of the space issues previously mentioned.

title: Perfect location in NYC
text: We felt comfortable and safe! The entire staff is phenomenal. The property is very clean and the breakfast is scrumptious! The location is perfect for downtown New York City; walking distance to shops and restaurants. We will be checking in again real soon.

title: Decisamente no!
text: Hotel in pieno centro, camera piuttosto piccola ma completa di tutto. Personale gentile e collaborativo. Ci sono però un paio di punti deboli, ovvero: 1) colazione decisamente povera e da consumarsi in un luogo angusto, con solo una ventina di posti, cosa che costringe ad alzarsi ad orari assurdi e a mangiare decisamente stipati; 2) pulizie effettuate solo al terzo giorno e solo su richiesta ( condizione però che non vedrete segnalata da nessuna parte). Ritengo questo secondo punto decisamente inaccettabile ed immotivato, ma a nulla sono servite le mie recriminazioni. In una città come New York c'è sicuramente di meglio.

title: Non e’ tutto oro…
text:
Certo, un ottimo prezzo ma a quali condizioni… pagamento immediato al check-in insieme alla firma di vari documenti compresa l’informativa che verrà addebitata una penale in caso di fumo in stanza. Si dimenticano però di dirti che la stanza viene pulita al 3’ giorno di soggiorno causa covid e poi su richiesta (se si ricordano di scriverlo: in sette notti ci è stata pulita solo due volte). Stessa cosa la sostituzione degli asciugamani che, eventualmente, su richiesta vengono comunque forniti.
Colazione a buffet con pane, vari tipi di bagel, qualche marmellata monodose, burro, uova, salsicce, yogurt, latte, cereali e frutta.

In parole povere…. Chi spende poco avrà poco! Sicuramente non tornerò in questo hotel.

title: Pulizia camera questo sconosciuto
text: La pulizia giornaliera delle camere è fatta solo su espressa richiesta in fase di check in. Noi non avendola richiesta avendola data per scontata ( era indicata in fase di prenotazione hotel) non è mai stata fatta durante la nostra permanenza di tre notti. Consiglio se la volete chiedetela espressamente ( assurdo). Per il wi fi è stato possibile collegare un solo telefono!!

title: Poorly designed and maintained room
text:
Bed was comfortable. Price was relatively low. 
AC/heat was the only way to get air circulation in room.  If temperature was right, it was very stuffy with no 
fan. Bathroom door slid open every time you closed it, no privacy. Only took 2 days to fix that, everything else was not fixed. Refrigerator made a high piercing noise so we had to turn it off. By design, there were no drawers or shelves in bedroom or bathroom.

title: Awesome
text: Had Awesome time at this hotel and the rooms n staff were great. I would definitely stay here again can’t wait to come back at this hotel in the near future and the price was right thank you so much for a wonderful stay see you soon.

title: Wingate by Wyndham
text: Hotel is centrally located. Alex the manager is nice and helpful but the GM was condescending and rude despite being unavailable to address our problems during our stay. The handheld shower didn’t work and wasn’t fixed. Our room was only cleaned on the third day despite our repeated requests. We were not informed at time of booking that our room would not be cleaned and the room could bit be canceled upon check in when we learned about this issue. We were told we would have fresh towels and soap and beds made daily but that was not the case until day 3.

title: Tiny rooms no hot water
text: These rooms are small. Like climbing over your partner to get out of bed small. No closet, a rack screwed into the wall above the coffee maker. 5 shirts max. No hot water in the shower. No way I’d pay the price for this again

title: Don’t bring anything that can’t fit into a small carry on
text: Smallest rooms I have ever seen. No place to move. Couldn’t unpack bc there is no place to do so. Only room for one small bag to be open. The only positive was the staff was nice and the room was clean. However housekeeping only comes every third day so it’s a good thing it is. Would never stay here again .

title: Good location, helpful staff
text: The rooms are not large, but the location is pretty central Manhattan so I suppose space is at a premium. The bed, though, was large and comfortable, and the bathroom was spacious and stylish (though without an actual bath, only a shower). Staff on the front desk were friendly and did their best to accommodate my requests (e.g. for early check-in). Overall, I was happy with my stay and will certainly consider using this hotel again.

title: Overnight Stay for Concert Trip
text: It was a pleasant stay with great service and a good view. The hotel was located right in the middle of everything and was a great price. I would go back anytime and recommended to anyone who wants to enjoy a new york weekend away from home

title: Molto buono
text: Sono stato in questo hotel nell'ultimo weekend di Luglio, la posizione è ottima, moderno e di recente costruzione,  stanze piccoline ma c'è tutto il necessario,  molto pulite, lo consiglio per soggiorni brevi ! Tutti gentilissimi

title: Nice short stay
text: We stayed here overnight. This is a new & centrally located hotel. The room is typical New York size but has everything you need, microwave,  refrigerator and microwave. Would definitely stay here again!

title: Better than expected
text: The brown bag breakfast is gone.  The breakfast room is open as of end of July, 2022 for coffee, tea, yogurt, pastries, cereal, oatmeal and fruit.  The rooms are small but I hear that about all NYC rooms.  It was perfect for a couple but I don't know how a family would fit.  Staff was all very friendly.   The housekeeping is only supposedly every 3 days but if you ask for something the response is very fast.  I think both times we requested something it was less than 10 minutes.  Would stay again.

title: Un hotel perfecto para Nueva York
text: Hotel con una excelente ubicación, con varias opciones para comer en los alrededores. Con una habitación muy limpia y en excelentes condiciones. Me encanto que había un conector usb para cargar los teléfonos celulares y/o Tablet!

title: Incredible experience
text: I had 2 rooms booked for 8 of my friends and we absolutely loved this hotel! The staff were phenomenal and extremely accommodating. Rooms were what is expected of new York Hotel but beautiful and very clean. Would highly recommend this hotel

title: Great Staff
text: We truly enjoyed our stay.  The hotel staff was very accommodating and helpful.  Alex was outstanding.  Even though the rooms are small but they were comfortable and clean.  Bottom Line...I would stay at this hotel if I was on a quick getaway.

title: Not exactly as advertised
text:
First off, no cleaning service for 3 nights “for your short stay.” We were given only two towels. The second night we had to wait over 30 minutes in our dirty, sweaty clothes after a long day before they brought towels and toilet paper upon our request. 

“Breakfast” …. is a brown bag of inedible stale packaged food. We didn’t even bother after throwing away the first bag. 

Our toilet kept gurgling and regurgitating throughout the stay. I almost wonder if there’s a plumbing issue in the whole hotel. Our room began to smell of sewage but we could not identify exactly where it was coming from. We’d grow immune to the smell only to rediscover the stench when we would leave and come back in. 

Room itself was clean when we arrived. Small but adequate space.

title: Muy buen servicio
text: Habitaciones limpias y cómodas con espacio razonable baño privado con todas las comodidades. Ubicación inmejorable está cerca de todo !! Y el personal muy amable y servicial a toda hora. El desayuno ligero y balanceado

title: Hotel ótimo, com café da manhã sofrível...
text:
Ótima localização, equipe atenciosa, estrutura no jeito.
Mas, o café da manhã...
Um saco com as coisas para você comer no quarto. Sem sentido, pois nesta fase da Pandemia já há muito contato interpessoal (os funcionários do hotel, inclusive, não usavam máscara durante nossa estadia). Estivemos em outros dois hotéis nesta viagem (em grandes cidades e sempre com Buffet no café da manhã).
Foi o único pecado!
Nosso quarto era com vista pro Empire State Building!  Inesquecível!

title: Very friendly staff, clean and newer accomodations
text: Wow, first of all... greeting upon arrival by Alex Rosado was amazing!  Thank you for the hospitality (great suggestions, friendly with family as we came and went, etc.).  About the hotel:  Rooms are modern and clean.  Fast response to any housekeeping needs.  There are not many rooms on each floor which is nice so you do not have constant "neighbor" noise.

title: Great hotel
text: This is a great place to enjoy a nice visit to NY, they will make your stay amazing and safe. Thanks Celina and Alex we definitely going to visit you guys next year, you made this trip remarkable for us, we recommend this location, you will be nearby for your convenience transportation and more importantly, you can really have a resting place to enjoy the time.

title: Small but Clean, Comfortable Accommodation, Excellent Front Desk Service
text: The room is small but clean and comfortable.  Service staff at the front desk were courteous, efficient, friendly, helpful.  They are a credit to Wingate.  The facility could do with more hand sanitizers, for instance, where the elevators are.  It could also do with some patio furniture at the location.

title: Great stay thumbs up!
text:
Front desk was extremely courteous, professional, and helpful. Hotel room was very clean, breakfast was terrific. Perfect location!!!  General manager Selina was very accommodating and the price was very reasonable.
    I would highly recommend this place, I would have to give a perfect 10!

title: Enjoyed My Stay There in April/May, Would Stay Again
text:
I enjoyed my stay there and think it deserves to be ranked  higher on here.  Suspect it’s low because it might be new.  I paid a little over $3000AUD/$2228USD for 9 nights.  Room was clean and in pretty good condition.  I booked a King Room with a large double bed through Booking.com.  Not huge but I think hotel rooms tend to be small in NYC.  There was room for everything, I just couldn’t open my large suitcase and leave it open without it being in the way, not the end of the world.  See photo attached.

Room had a safe, TV, mini fridge, ice box, marble top desk with lamp and chair, open closet space (with electric steamer) next to the bed for hanging jackets and shirts and 4 shelves above the bed so I used the shelves for folded clothes and as bedside table space.

On arrival, I was given a choice of two rooms.  A room on the street side that had a nicer view or a room at the back without a nice view, nice touch that they gave me a choice, went with the back one to avoid street noise and for the slightly bigger bathroom.  My room had the bathroom sink in the bathroom, not in the room like others do.  

Floor was nice – wood or vinyl that looks like wood, I prefer that to carpet.  

Bed was comfortable.  

Bathroom was nice and one of the selling points for me to book this hotel.  Marble walls in the long stand up roomy shower enclosed with well designed glass wall and door to keep the water in.  Large overhead rain shower head as well as a detachable alternative shower head to switch to.  Decent water pressure and great temperature.  There was an air vent, no switch to turn it on but the bathroom never got steamy/fogged up.  Not much room around the sink to put toiletries but two shelves under it so I used those.  

Block out curtain kept the light out.  Lighting wasn’t super bright, but was decent.

Room was fairly quiet.  Only 4 rooms on my floor.   I didn’t get any street noise.  The walls are thin, you do hear other people in their rooms and in the hall.  But I guess the people on my floor were quiet and considerate as it wasn’t an issue for me.

The staff were very nice.

I’ve read reviews of other hotels in NYC where people have to wait a long time for lifts.  Never the case here.  Only 4 rooms per floor and lifts always came right away.

Only issue was the WiFi.  I was given a password for it but I got low security warnings for it on both my phone and laptop so I didn’t use it.

I read reviews complaining about the breakfast.  Not an issue for me as I wanted to eat out.  There's a couple of Fresh & Co locations nearby so I went there.

Beyond Sushi a couple of blocks down is excellent if you don’t mind eating plant-based sushi.  There's a good vegan Korean restaurant called Franchia Cafe on Park Avenue about 3 or 4 blocks away too.  Location was pretty good, fairly central but enough of a distance from Times Square.  Broadway theatres are about a 12 minute walk away.

title: So-So / just by the means
text:
Look, staff is really great and the hotel has this wonderful clean aroma. 

But other than that, rooms are super cramped. good luck if its 2 people. I was by my self and it was already cramped. House keeping is every 3 days so I had trash piled up in the garbage for days. I will give the rooms are somewhat "modern".

I need a sepreate passage for the breakfast.. covid is almost done and they're still using covid as an excuse to not have a real breakfast. At the moment it is grab a paper bag and go, inside ... stuff you would find in a middle school. I'm sorry.  Plus why does it end at 9 am ? I missed the breakfast almost everyday because it was so early. For the price you're paying ... you can find better.

Hotel is really simple, no amenities like gym/pool, or outdoorspace.
- This is a hotel that really is just to get by your means.

title: Excelente para pasar unos días. Excelente atención de los empleados. Lugar en el centro
text:
Excelente. Con las comodidades básicas. Excelente lugar para salir y estar a poca distancia de lugares especiales del centro 
El desayuno y la limpieza diaria de la habitación quizá esté afectado por el protocolo COVID. Se podría re ver

title: Ewa&Jim in NYC
text: Small hotel in convenient location. Breakfast ends at 9:00am. Since we were in the hotel about 12:30pm, we were asked and we agreed that for additional $25.00 we can check in earlier than the typical check-in time.

title: Super nice staff, nice room, breakfast was a bummer
text: The staff was incredibly helpful, and we felt right at home in our room. But we'd seen recent reviews that regular breakfast had started back up, but while we were there, they were handing out grab-and-go breakfast in a sack, and it was basically just all cheap sugar - otis spunkmeyer muffin, quaker oats s'mores granola bar, tropicana orange juice, and a fruit-cup (which is obviously packaged in sugar). I mean, that sack had to have 80 grams of sugar. It's a lot of stuff, I'll give them that, but no protein so for me anyway, it's not worth much in terms of energy when I'm about to go walk all day. Aside from that, the stay was awesome... hotel was very easy to access, very centrally located, very courteous and helpful staff.

title: Hotel Needs Work!
text:
Hotel refuses to serve breakfast following Covid-19 virus and only provides a “Grab and Go.“

4 Day stay with no housekeeping.

Thus, no cream of any kind for coffee.

Rooms have no drawers of any kind for clothing.

Empire State View is top 20% of building with obsubstructed view while climbing over the bed with no opportunity to stand.

title: Ottima struttura e posizione eccellente!
text: Centrale ma silenzioso. Pulito e letto king molto comodo. Da non perdere le camere con vista sull’Empire State Building (un bel modo per coricarsi e per iniziare la giornata)! Personale gentile e discreto. Peccato solo per la colazione nel sacchetto da mangiare in camera a causa delle restrizioni Covid. Ma arriveranno tempi migliori!

title: Regular
text:
El hotel está muy céntrico.

En cuanto al desayuno buffet que pague, No lo hay. Deberian decirlo por adelantado que no disponen de buffet, ya que te dicen que es por el Covid y luego les ves a ellos sin mascarilla, mucho sentido no tiene. 
(Tienes que bajar cada día a pedirles el “desayuno” y te dan una mini bolsita con 1 muffin de plátano, agua, mini copa de fruta en almíbar y un yogur: malísimo).

En cuanto a a habitación, hay que decir que está limpio todo, lo único, que se les olvidó hacernos la habitación en 2 ocasiones. Lo dijimos. Y qué además, hay que decirles cada día, eso no me gusta mucho, no es cómodo.

Por último, pese a que la habitación está bien limpia y decorada, recomendaría que cambiasen la habitación o al menos, a mi pareja y a mi no nos hizo mucha gracia. 
Está por un lado el baño con solo una ducha y el bater, y por otro lado, en la habitación, junto a la cama, el espejo con el lavabo. No es nada cómodo y qué además, cada vez que te vas a lavar lo dientes o maquilar, te ven los vecinos, ya que las cortinas tampoco tapan. 

*Tampoco hay persianas, pero de esto no me quejo, ya que en EEUU quizás no las hay.

title: Great Location
text:
So this little hotel is right in the middle of everything.  20 meters from 5th avenue and access to a lot of sights.
It is a small hotel, the room service is done every third day but you can access towels etc when ever you want.
The breakfast is a grab bag - due to Covid and this is a muffin, nut bar, yogurt, fruit and a drink. Coffee machine in your room with coffee and tea pods at your request and as many as you want. The room we had was not huge but a big comfortable bed and very nice sized bathroom. Free WiFi which was good.
Really friendly staff and clean hotel. I would recommend and would visit again.

title: Avoid this Hotel
text: The hotel owner/manager is the most unkind and unfriendly manager I have ever encountered in a hotel. There is no concern for the customer's needs. Breakfast is a joke inside a paper bag you have to collect from reception and in a week the room was cleaned once. The only good thing is location, but there are several hotels around. I will never return to this hotel.

title: Localização ótima e confortável, café da manhã horrivel
text: Café da manhã horrivel, muffin de terceira, barra de cereal, um yogurt e uma aguá. Voce tem que pegar na recepção e levar p quarto, mesmo tudo funcionando normalmente em NY. Limpeza do quarto tem q pedir senão nem o lixo retiram, e check out é as 11 AM, paguei 50 dolares para ficar até as 2 e queria ficar até as 5 mas queriam me cobrar mais uma diária de 179 dol. Guardam as malas mas não tem banheiro "utilizavel", somente um no subsolo em área de lavanderia.

title: Very comfy.  Close to everything.
text:
The hotel is very well located. My friend and I feel very safe in the area. It is 1 block from the Empire States building and 7 minutes from Times Square. There are at least two metro stations nearby.

The room is small, but modern, comfortable and clean. The mattress is super comfortable.

The personnel is very friendly.

title: Short walk to Broadway!!
text: Got in Friday morning, taxi to Hotel ($$$+tip) but, I would not have attempted to rent a car and drive us over an hour from JFK in NYC traffic!!  Consider it a worthwhile cost.  Hotel arranged a taxi to get us back to JFK, also (less$$+tip) but worth it.  Plenty of restaurants, walk down the block to 5th Avenue . . . short walk to Broadway . . . .  Hotel staff knowledgeable about the local restaurants, room was small, but sufficient for 2 people.  I did not like having the bathroom sink in the room, but heck, for 2 nights it was ok.  Saw the Lion King!  Spectacular!! Breakfast was "bagged", go to the lobby and request your bag!  Water, fruit, muffin, yogurt, coffee/tea in room.  Free WIFI, good TV channel selection. oh, I forgot to mention,  the king bed was too big for the room, the side near the windows was so close to the wall that person had to shimmy down to the foot of the bed to go to the bathroom.

title: Excellent Location
text: I came into New York to visit family and friends. The hotel is excellent excellent location in Midtown not far from a lot of tourist destinations. Walking distance down to Rockefeller Center, Saint Patrick’s Cathedral  and of course the Empire State building and if he really want to do a little bit of shopping you’re not too far from Macy’s. It’s a subway ride over to Washington Square. You’re not too far from Times Square.

title: Hôtel datant de 2019 ! Vraiment bien
text: Chambre très propre. Petite mais confortable. Le cabinet de la salle de bain était dû côté de la chambre. Internet pas le plus rapide et mise à jour de la connexion sécurisée date de plus d'un an. Bien situé et bon rapport qualité/prix. Idéal pour 1 nuit, max 2.

title: THE WORSE HOTEL EVER TRIED IN 50 YEARS
text:
If you want to stay in a nice hotel in NYC, better to stay away from Wingate. Room was advertised in Booking.com as a 27-square meters one, it was not even a 20-square maters one.
They do not do room cleaning, with the excuse of Covid. They give you the breakfast in paper bags, to be eaten into the small room, with awful elements. Last but not least, they keep the luggage till 2 pm, forcing you to go around the city with bags in the afternoon. The worse hotel ever tried in my life.

title: Small room without proper breakfast
text:
The staff was really nice and they kept our luggage safe both the first day before the check-in time and the last day after we checked out. The building and the room were modern, just a little tiny but I assume that's probably common in this part of the city. If you are lucky as we were and you get a room pointed south on one of the higher floors, you will have a great view of Empire State Building directly from your bed.

We chose this property because our reservation at another hotel was cancelled and this one was in the same location and promised similar experience (e.g. breakfast included) for just slightly higher price.
